html:
US STOCKS: Amazon Earnings Beat, Shares Jump
Amazon announced 4Q earnings per share of $27.75 blowing past $3.77 est. Shares
surge to 3207.84 vs. 2776.91 on the close.
* AMAZON SEES 1Q NET SALES $112.0B TO $117.0B, EST. $120.51B, bbg
* AMAZON 4Q EPS $27.75, EST. $3.77, Bbg
* AMAZON 4Q NET SALES $137.4B, EST. $137.82B, Bbg
* AMAZON 4Q OPER INCOME $3.5B, EST. $2.43B, Bbg
SPX eminis bounced off late session lows of 4465.50 to 4504.75 after the
release are scaling back to 4495.0.
